name: Just Enough Items (JEI)
author: mezz
description: View Items and Recipes

name: Biomes O' Plenty
author: forstride
description: Adds 50+ unique biomes to enhance your world, with new trees, flowers, and more!

name: Hwyla
author: tehnut
description: Hwyla (Here's What You're Looking At) is a UI improvement mod aimed at providing block information directly in-game. It is also a fork of Waila.

name: AppleSkin
author: squeek502
description: Adds some useful information about food/hunger to the HUD

name: CoFH Core
author: teamcofh
description: Contains Core Functionality for all Team CoFH mods. Also does some really cool stuff on its own!

name: Mouse Tweaks

description: Enhances inventory management by adding various functions to the mouse buttons.

name: Bookshelf
author: darkhaxdev
description: An open source library for other mods!

name: AutoRegLib
author: vazkii
description: A library to ease menial tasks in mod development.

name: Patchouli
author: vazkii
description: Accessible, Data-Driven, Dependency-Free Documentation for Minecraft Modders and Pack Makers

name: Quark
author: vazkii
description: A Quark is a very small thing. This mod is a collection of small things that improve the vanilla minecraft experience.

name: Botania
author: vazkii
description: An innovative natural magic themed tech mod

name: Controlling
author: jaredlll08
description: Adds a search bar to the Key-Bindings menu

name: CreativeCore
author: creativemd
description: a core mod

name: Better Advancements
author: way2muchnoise
description: Successor to BetterAchievements for the new advancements system in minecraft 1.12+

name: Phosphor (Forge)

description: Performance improvements for Minecraft's lighting engine

name: MixinBootstrap

description: MixinBootstrap is a temporary way of booting Mixin in a MinecraftForge production environment.

name: NetherPortalFix
author: blaytheninth
description: Ensures correct destinations when travelling back and forth through Nether Portals in Multiplayer.

name: Curios API (Forge)
author: theillusivec4
description: A flexible and expandable accessory/equipment API for users and developers.

name: AI Improvements
author: darkguardsman
description: Performance and logic upgrades for mod AIs

name: Serene Seasons
author: theadubbz
description: Seasons with changing colors, shifting temperatures, and more!

name: Default Options
author: blaytheninth
description: A way for modpacks to ship a default (key) configuration without having to include an options.txt file. Also allows local options from any mod .cfg file.

name: KleeSlabs
author: blaytheninth
description: Break only the half of a double slab that you're looking at.

name: AmbientSounds 3
author: creativemd
description: #listentonature

name: Tool Belt
author: gigaherz
description: A utility belt that holds your tools

name: Bad Wither No Cookie - Reloaded
author: kreezxil
description: Localizes the wither and dragon attacking sounds.

name: Sound Filters
author: tmtravlr
description: A client-side mod that adds reverb to caves, and mutes sounds when you're underwater or when the sound is behind a wall.

name: Inventory Sorter
author: cpw
description: Simple inventory sorting tweaks

name: Abnormals Core
author: smellymodder
description: Library for all Abnormals mods

name: YUNG's Better Caves
author: yungnickyoung
description: Overhauled cave generation, underground lakes and rivers, lava oceans, and more!

name: Ding
author: ohaiichun
description: Plays a configurable sound when Minecraft loads and reaches the Main Menu or connects to a server.

name: AttributeFix
author: darkhaxdev
description: Removes arbitrary limits on Minecraft's attribute system. Fixes MANY mods!

name: Charm

name: ItemPhysic Full
author: creativemd
description: #enhancedphysics

description: A mod that simply adds a helmet with dynamic lighting.

author: vazkii
description: An addon to Quark containing thoughtfully designed features for players to build around

name: YUNG's Better Mineshafts (Forge)
author: yungnickyoung
description: A long-awaited and much-needed abandoned mineshaft overhaul!

description: Collective is a shared library with common code for all of Serilum's mods.

name: FindMe

name: MaLiLib
author: masady
description: A library mod required for masa's client-side mods

name: Performant
author: someaddon
description: Lag begone! Increases Performance, less entity lag less rubberbanding, more players on the server

name: The Endergetic Expansion
author: endergized
description: This mod aims to expands upon The End by adding a variety of features to the barren landscape along with alien flora and fauna to make it livelier.

name: Upgrade Aquatic
author: minecraftabnormals
description: A mod that improves the content in Update Aquatic.

author: genandnic

name: Ensorcellation
author: teamcofh
description: Enchantments!

name: Champions

name: Kottle

description: Arrows! And archery stuff in general.

name: Swamp Expansion
author: farcr
description: A mod that expands upon the swamp, a biome full of potential yet weak in execution.

name: Dungeons Plus

description: A mod that adds some simple Vanilla+ styled dungeons, while showcasing the Strucure Gel API.

name: Autumnity

description: Adds an autumn-themed biome with a new wood type and a new critter, which lives there.

name: Atmospheric
author: paradiscal
description: Adds a series of unique biomes. Currently includes rosewood forests and dunes.

name: Extra Boats
author: martianarchitecture
description: Adds some new types of boats to make ocean exploration more interesting.

name: Curious Shulker Boxes (Forge)

name: Tetra
author: mickelus
description: Modular items, exploration and technology

name: Item Scroller
author: masady
description: Move items by mouse wheel scrolling, Shift + dragging, etc.

name: Bloomful

description: See Flower Forests in full bloom!

name: GamemodeOverhaul
author: marcus_8448

description: An exploration and adventure add-on for Charm

name: Berry Good
author: minecraftabnormals
description: Makes eating sweet berries less annoying

author: serilum
description: [Client] Shows the time/days played in the GUI/HUD with a clock in the inventory.
